trans-unit.source: ImageConverter is a class that can be used to convert <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> objects from one data type to another.
trans-unit.target: ImageConverter er en klasse som kan brukes til å konvertere <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> objekter fra én data type til en annen.

trans-unit.source: Access this class through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Få tilgang til denne klassen via den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> can convert an instance of a specified type to an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om dette <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"> </xref> kan konvertere en forekomst av angitt type til en <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>, ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` only if `sourceType` is equal to a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `true` bare hvis `sourceType` er lik en bytematrise.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that specifies the type you want to convert from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som angir typen du vil konvertere fra.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"> </xref> kan utføre konverteringen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> can convert an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to an instance of a specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om dette <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"> </xref> kan konvertere en <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> til en forekomst av angitt type, ved hjelp av den angitte konteksten.

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` only if `sourceType` is equal to a byte array or string.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer `true` bare hvis `sourceType` er lik bytematrise eller streng.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that specifies the type you want to convert to.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som angir typen du vil konvertere til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"></xref> can perform the conversion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> Hvis <xref href="System.Drawing.ImageConverter"> </xref> kan utføre konverteringen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified object to an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer et angitt objekt til en <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> som gir en format-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that holds information about a specific culture.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>som inneholder informasjon om en bestemt kultur.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som skal konverteres.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If this method succeeds, it returns the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that it created by converting the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden lykkes, returneres den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> den opprettet ved å konvertere det angitte objektet.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Ellers oppstår det et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be completed.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke fullføre konverteringen.

trans-unit.source: Converts an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> (or an object that can be cast to an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>) to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Konverterer en <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> (eller et objekt som kan brukes som en <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>) til den angitte typen.

trans-unit.source: The most common type conversion is to and from a string type.
trans-unit.target: Vanligste typekonvertering er til og fra en strengtype.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation calls the <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> method of the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is string.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering kall den <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>metoden for objektet hvis objektet er gyldig og måltypen er streng.</xref:System.Object.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot convert the specified object to the destination type, it throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne metoden ikke kan konvertere det angitte objektet til måltypen, oppstår det et <xref:System.NotSupportedException>unntak.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: A formatter context.
trans-unit.target: En formatering-kontekst.

trans-unit.source: This object can be used to get more information about the environment this converter is being called from.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet kan brukes til å få mer informasjon om denne konverteringsprogram kalles fra miljøet.

trans-unit.source: This may be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, so you should always check.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, slik at du alltid bør kontrollere.

trans-unit.source: Also, properties on the context object may also return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Også egenskapene context-objektet også kan returnere <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that specifies formatting conventions used by a particular culture.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objekt som angir tekstformatering som gjelder brukes av en bestemt kultur.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> til å konvertere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to convert the <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Type>til å konvertere det <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> til.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This method returns the converted object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer konverterte objektet.

trans-unit.source: The conversion cannot be completed.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke fullføre konverteringen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of properties for this type.
trans-unit.target: Henter settet med egenskaper for denne typen.

trans-unit.source: By default, a type does not return any properties.
trans-unit.target: Som standard returnerer ikke en type egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: An easy implementation of this method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties%2A> method for the correct data type.
trans-unit.target: En enkelt implementering av denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties%2A>metode for riktig datatype.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.GetProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: Ytterligere kontekst kan angis som en typebeskrivelse.

trans-unit.source: The value of the object to get the properties for.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for objektet som skal hente egenskaper for.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Attribute> objects that describe the properties.
trans-unit.target: En matrise av <xref:System.Attribute>objekter som beskriver egenskapene.</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: The set of properties that should be exposed for this data type.
trans-unit.target: Sett med egenskaper som skal vises for denne datatypen.

trans-unit.source: If no properties should be exposed, this can return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen egenskaper skal vises, kan dette returnere <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering alltid returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this object supports properties.
trans-unit.target: Angir om dette objektet støtter egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: By default, this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dette er som standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A type descriptor through which additional context can be provided.
trans-unit.target: Ytterligere kontekst kan angis som en typebeskrivelse.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Drawing.ImageConverter.GetProperties*> method should be called to find the properties of this object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref:System.Drawing.ImageConverter.GetProperties*>metoden må kalles for å finne egenskaper for dette objektet.</xref:System.Drawing.ImageConverter.GetProperties*>
